title: Correlated Asset Lag
mechanism: On Polymarket, traders profit from 'correlated asset lag' - e.g., betting on a cabinet pick after a presidential win is confirmed, before that market adjusts. In Kalshi, when related markets exist, does resolution of one predict movement in another?

proposed_signal.condition: Market A resolves, related market B exists, bet on B in direction consistent with A outcome
proposed_signal.action: Trade correlated markets before they adjust

novelty_vs_tested: H111 (same-event multi-market) is still QUEUED. This is similar but focuses on POST-resolution lag
